com.tokelon.toktales.core.render.opengl.gl20

Interface IGL

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGL11, IGL12, IGL13, IGL14, IGL15, IGL20, IGL21
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidGL11, AndroidGL13, AndroidGL14, AndroidGL15, AndroidGL20, DesktopGL11, DesktopGL13, DesktopGL14, DesktopGL15, DesktopGL20

    public interface IGL
    OGL2 definition of OpenGL CompatWrapper.

    The OpenGL CompatWrapper consists of IGL interfaces (one for each version), which contain all GL functions that can be used under compatibility with OpenGLES.

    Note that, while some definitions use larger size types (eg. long, double), these may be casted down in implementations for platforms that do not support them (ex. Android).

    See Also:
    IGL11, IGL12, IGL13, IGL14, IGL15, IGL20, IGL21
